breakthroughPP.players

Class InterActivePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • breakthroughPP.players.AbstractPlayer
      • breakthroughPP.players.InterActivePlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Player, Setting, java.rmi.Remote

    public class InterActivePlayer
extends AbstractPlayer
    Implementation of an interactive player playing the game breakthroughPP

    Georg-August University Goettingen APP breakthroughPP SoSe 2016

    Author:
    Haseeb Sabar Anar, Artur Zorn

      • request

        public Move request()
             throws java.lang.Exception,
                    java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from class: AbstractPlayer
        Asks the player for a move. Here no real implementation only checking and advancing of the state machine that represents the move cycle of a player.
        Specified by:
        request in interface Player
        Overrides:
        request in class AbstractPlayer
        Returns:
        the move that this player wants to do next
        Throws:
        PresetException - if an input instance is not connected with this player
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the connection with the net throws one
        java.lang.Exception - if another exception occures
        See Also:
        Player.request()
